item.title: EF Core Update Model on Database First Project
item.description: Developing a project using .NET Core and Entity Framework, using an existing database, does not come with a Model update wizard. But still, it doesn't have to be a daunting task.

item.title: Generating PDF in .NET Core using Libreoffice
item.description: Looking for Nuget extensions to generate PDF output? Here's an interesting option that uses templates in DOCX/HTML and performs the conversion.

item.description: Working on information systems integration, often comes the task of implementing a Web Service following a previously defined contract.

item.title: Automatic class creation for unmarshalling JSON
item.description: If you're working with JSON, say for REST web services, and you don't have the class to unmarshall the response, Visual Studio can automatically generate the class for you.
